name: Crash 'n Burn
overview: Deathdrome Champion or road kill? You decide! It's 2044 A.D. and they just dropped the big one. Anybody who didn't fry knows the rules - shoot first, loot later. Now's your chance to take it out on the highway. Speed-shift against six trash-talking psychos. The only way to shut 'em up is to blow 'em up!
